# STREAMING::START_PLAYER_SWITCH

## Summary
Starts a player switching sequence

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** oldPed
* **PED_INDEX** newPedindex
* **SWITCH_FLAGS** flags: Specifies a number of control options as per enum SWITCH_FLAGS
* **SWITCH_TYPE** type = 0

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
starts player switch

// this enum comes directly from R* so don't edit this
enum ePlayerSwitchTypes
{
  SWITCH_TYPE_AUTO,
 SWITCH_TYPE_LONG,
 SWITCH_TYPE_MEDIUM,
   SWITCH_TYPE_SHORT
};

Use GET_IDEAL_PLAYER_SWITCH_TYPE for the best switch type.

----------------------------------------------------

Examples from the decompiled scripts:

STREAMING::START_PLAYER_SWITCH(l_832._f3, PLAYER::PLAYER_PED_ID(), 0, 3);
STREAMING::START_PLAYER_SWITCH(l_832._f3, PLAYER::PLAYER_PED_ID(), 2050, 3);
STREAMING::START_PLAYER_SWITCH(PLAYER::PLAYER_PED_ID(), l_832._f3, 1024, 3);
STREAMING::START_PLAYER_SWITCH(g_141F27, PLAYER::PLAYER_PED_ID(), 513, v_14);

Note: DO NOT, use SWITCH_TYPE_LONG with flag 513. It leaves you stuck in the clouds. You'll have to call STOP_PLAYER_SWITCH() to return to your ped.

Flag 8 w/ SWITCH_TYPE_LONG will zoom out 3 steps, then zoom in 2/3 steps and stop on the 3rd and just hang there.
Flag 8 w/ SWITCH_TYPE_MEDIUM will zoom out 1 step, and just hang there.
